TypeSignature.Value: .class public sequential ansi sealed beforefieldinit X509IssuerSerial extends System.ValueType

summary.span: 代表 XML 簽章的 <> 項目。

span.span: Represents the <> element of an XML digital signature.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 結構表示` 元素的 XML 數位簽章規格所定義之 XML 數位簽章。The structure represents the ` element of an XML digital signature defined by the XML digital signature specification. ` 元素是子元素 <`X509Data`> 元素，其中包含 X.509v3 憑證簽發者的辨別名稱和序號配對。The ` element is the subelement of the <`X509Data`> element that contains an X.509v3 certificate issuer's distinguished name and serial number pair. 辨別的名稱和序號配對有助於找出特定的 X.509v3 憑證。The distinguished name and serial number pair help identify a specific X.509v3 certificate. X.509 憑證的簽發者是發行憑證的憑證授權單位的名稱。The issuer of an X.509 certificate is the name of the certification authority that issued the certificate. 憑證授權單位指派每個發出做為識別用途的唯一序號的憑證。Certification authorities assign each certificate they issue a unique serial number for identification purposes. 使用使用時，結構，以指定憑證簽發者的辨別名稱和序號配對類別。Use the structure to specify a certificate issuer's distinguished name and serial number pair when using the class. 您可以加入結構類別使用屬性。You can add an structure to the class using the property. 或者，您可以在其中新增字串值，代表 X.509 憑證簽發者的辨別的名稱和序號配對使用方法。Alternatively, you can add string values that represent the X.509 certificate issuer's distinguished name and serial number pair using the method. 如需詳細資訊` 項目，請參閱 www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/ 的 World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) 規格。For more information about the ` element, see the World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) specification at www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何簽署和驗證 XML 文件使用從憑證存放區的 X.509 憑證。The following code example demonstrates how to sign and verify an XML document using an X.509 certificate from a certificate store. 此範例會將資訊儲存到帶正負號的文件時使用物件。This example saves key information to the signed document using the object. [!code-csharp[System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.X509IssuerSerial#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.Xml.X509IssuerSerial/cs/sample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.X509IssuerSerial#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.Xml.X509IssuerSerial/vb/sample.vb#1)]

summary.span: 取得或設定 X.509 憑證簽發者的辨別名稱。

span.span: Gets or sets an X.509 certificate issuer's distinguished name.

value.span: X.509 憑證簽發者的辨別名稱。

span.span: An X.509 certificate issuer's distinguished name.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性表示中所指定的 X.509 憑證簽發者的辨別的名稱` 項目。The property represents an X.509 certificate issuer's distinguished name specified in the ` element. 如需詳細資訊` 項目，請參閱 www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/ 的 World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) 規格。For more information about the ` element, see the World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) specification at www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何簽署和驗證 XML 文件使用從憑證存放區的 X.509 憑證。The following code example demonstrates how to sign and verify an XML document using an X.509 certificate from a certificate store. 此範例會將資訊儲存到帶正負號的文件時使用物件。This example saves key information to the signed document using the object.
